listitem.para: struct Photon.Realtime.PhotonPortDefinition
Container for port definitions.
class Photon.Realtime.LoadBalancingClient
This class implements the Photon LoadBalancing workflow by using a LoadBalancingPeer.
interface Photon.Realtime.IConnectionCallbacks
Collection of "organizational" callbacks for the Realtime Api to cover: Connection and Regions.
interface Photon.Realtime.ILobbyCallbacks
Collection of "organizational" callbacks for the Realtime Api to cover the Lobby.
interface Photon.Realtime.IMatchmakingCallbacks
Collection of "organizational" callbacks for the Realtime Api to cover Matchmaking.
interface Photon.Realtime.IInRoomCallbacks
Collection of "in room" callbacks for the Realtime Api to cover: Players entering or leaving, property updates and Master Client switching.
interface Photon.Realtime.IOnEventCallback
Event callback for the Realtime Api.
interface Photon.Realtime.IWebRpcCallback
Interface for "WebRpc" callbacks for the Realtime Api.
interface Photon.Realtime.IErrorInfoCallback
Interface for EventCode.ErrorInfo event callback for the Realtime Api.
class Photon.Realtime.ConnectionCallbacksContainer
Container type for callbacks defined by IConnectionCallbacks.
class Photon.Realtime.MatchMakingCallbacksContainer
Container type for callbacks defined by IMatchmakingCallbacks.
class Photon.Realtime.InRoomCallbacksContainer
Container type for callbacks defined by IInRoomCallbacks.
class Photon.Realtime.LobbyCallbacksContainer
Container type for callbacks defined by ILobbyCallbacks.
class Photon.Realtime.WebRpcCallbacksContainer
Container type for callbacks defined by IWebRpcCallback.
class Photon.Realtime.ErrorInfoCallbacksContainer
Container type for callbacks defined by IErrorInfoCallback.
class Photon.Realtime.ErrorInfo
Class wrapping the received EventCode.ErrorInfo event.
namespace Photon
namespace Photon.Realtime

enum Photon.Realtime.ClientState { Photon.Realtime.ClientState.PeerCreated , Photon.Realtime.ClientState.Authenticating , Photon.Realtime.ClientState.Authenticated , Photon.Realtime.ClientState.JoiningLobby , Photon.Realtime.ClientState.JoinedLobby , Photon.Realtime.ClientState.DisconnectingFromMasterServer , Photon.Realtime.ClientState.DisconnectingFromMasterserver = DisconnectingFromMasterServer , Photon.Realtime.ClientState.ConnectingToGameServer , Photon.Realtime.ClientState.ConnectingToGameserver = ConnectingToGameServer , Photon.Realtime.ClientState.ConnectedToGameServer , Photon.Realtime.ClientState.ConnectedToGameserver = ConnectedToGameServer , Photon.Realtime.ClientState.Joining , Photon.Realtime.ClientState.Joined , Photon.Realtime.ClientState.Leaving , Photon.Realtime.ClientState.DisconnectingFromGameServer , Photon.Realtime.ClientState.DisconnectingFromGameserver = DisconnectingFromGameServer , Photon.Realtime.ClientState.ConnectingToMasterServer , Photon.Realtime.ClientState.ConnectingToMasterserver = ConnectingToMasterServer , Photon.Realtime.ClientState.Disconnecting , Photon.Realtime.ClientState.Disconnected , Photon.Realtime.ClientState.ConnectedToMasterServer , Photon.Realtime.ClientState.ConnectedToMasterserver = ConnectedToMasterServer , Photon.Realtime.ClientState.ConnectedToMaster = ConnectedToMasterServer , Photon.Realtime.ClientState.ConnectingToNameServer , Photon.Realtime.ClientState.ConnectedToNameServer , Photon.Realtime.ClientState.DisconnectingFromNameServer , Photon.Realtime.ClientState.ConnectWithFallbackProtocol }
State values for a client, which handles switching Photon server types, some operations, etc.

enum Photon.Realtime.DisconnectCause { Photon.Realtime.None , Photon.Realtime.ExceptionOnConnect , Photon.Realtime.DnsExceptionOnConnect , Photon.Realtime.ServerAddressInvalid , Photon.Realtime.Exception , Photon.Realtime.ServerTimeout , Photon.Realtime.ClientTimeout , Photon.Realtime.DisconnectByServerLogic , Photon.Realtime.DisconnectByServerReasonUnknown , Photon.Realtime.InvalidAuthentication , Photon.Realtime.CustomAuthenticationFailed , Photon.Realtime.AuthenticationTicketExpired , Photon.Realtime.MaxCcuReached , Photon.Realtime.InvalidRegion , Photon.Realtime.OperationNotAllowedInCurrentState , Photon.Realtime.DisconnectByClientLogic , Photon.Realtime.DisconnectByOperationLimit , Photon.Realtime.DisconnectByDisconnectMessage }
Enumeration of causes for Disconnects (used in LoadBalancingClient.DisconnectedCause).
enum Photon.Realtime.ServerConnection { Photon.Realtime.MasterServer , Photon.Realtime.GameServer , Photon.Realtime.NameServer }
Available server (types) for internally used field: server.
enum Photon.Realtime.ClientAppType { Photon.Realtime.Realtime , Photon.Realtime.Voice , Photon.Realtime.Fusion }
Defines which sort of app the LoadBalancingClient is used for: Realtime or Voice.

enum Photon.Realtime.EncryptionMode { Photon.Realtime.PayloadEncryption , Photon.Realtime.DatagramEncryption = 10 , Photon.Realtime.DatagramEncryptionRandomSequence = 11 , Photon.Realtime.DatagramEncryptionGCM = 13 }
Defines how the communication gets encrypted.
